content:
From: Peter Lammich <lammich@in.tum.de>
Hi,

when building the proof document for JinjaThreads, LaTex reports the
following error:

! Dimension too large.
*** <argument> \ht \@tempboxa

*** l.59 ...raphics[height=\textheight]{session_graph}

*** <session_graph.pdf, id=17, 3728.93124pt x 20540.74pt> <use
session_graph.pdf>

Is there a possibility to generate the session-graph with a lower
resolution, to avoid such errors?
